title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Strong emotions might tunnel out of you before you can stop them today. Your volatility suggests that youre not being entirely honest with yourself or others, and now you must come clean. Thankfully, you still can control how you divulge your truth. A quick internal scan of your mind could reveal who and whats still bothering you. It may require a little extra labor to present your concern in a diplomatic manner, but your attention to the details is worth the trouble. The right words can invite reconciliation rather than confrontation. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
